displaytitle: The Betrayal of Christ, Plate 13(of 28) of The Passion  (Hollstein 27, Kerrich 48, 10 (engr by Hemmskerck? prob by Dirk Volkertsz)
medium: etching; watermark: crowned escutcheon with two scroll-like motifs
dimensions: sheet trimmed to plate: 25.2 x 19.7 cm (9 15/16 x 7 3/4 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase, Laura P. Hall Memorial Fund
inscribed: signed in plate, l.l.: Martinus Heemskerck

caption: Engraver Dirck Volckertsz Coornhert (1522–1590; born Amsterdam, Netherlands; died Gouda, Netherlands), after Maarten van Heemskerck (1498–1574; born Heemskerck, Netherlands; died Haarlem, Netherlands), The Betrayal of Christ, Plate 13(of 28) of The Passion  (Hollstein 27, Kerrich 48, 10 (engr by Hemmskerck? prob by Dirk Volkertsz). Etching; watermark: crowned escutcheon with two scroll-like motifs; 25.2 x 19.7 cm (plate). Museum purchase, Laura P. Hall Memorial Fund (x1981-21)
